body.name: Proctor Silex Simply-Crisp Toaster Oven Air Fryer Combo with 4 Functions Including Convection, Bake & Broil, Fits 4 Slices or 12” Pizza, Auto Shutoff, Black (31265)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: POWERFUL AIR CIRCULATION FOR EVENLY BROWNED FOOD WITH LITTLE TO NO OIL: The Simply-Crisp air fry convection mode circulates air around food as it cooks, creating crispy and delicious fries, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables and more.

AIR FRYER CONVECTION OVEN WITH 4 VERSATILE COOKING OPTIONS: You get the convenience and deliciousness of crispy air frying along with all the classic toaster oven functions you love: bake, broil and toast.
SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: Built for small spaces, this toaster oven has 2 rack positions and plenty of room for all your favorite foods. It fits 4 slices of bread, a personal pizza or 1/2 pound of fries.

EASY TO USE: The air fryer oven has 2 independent control knobs. The timer knob operates up to 30 minutes and has an optional Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff. The temperature knob lets you select cooking temperatures from 200°F to 450°F.

INCLUDES ACCESSORIES: The toaster oven with air fryer comes with a chrome-plated rack and a nesting bake pan, plus an integrated drop-down crumb tray. The metal mesh rack has handles that slide into the oven slots.
body.description: The Proctor Silex® Simply-Crisp™ Air Fryer Toaster Oven creates evenly browned, crispy foods with the Simply-Crisp™ air frying mode. The toaster oven fits 4 slices of bread and has the classic toaster oven functions you love: bake, broil and toast.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful Air Circulation for Evenly Browned Food with Little to No Oil The Simply-Crisp air fry convection mode circulates air around food as it cooks, creating crispy and delicious fries, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables and more.

Tested. Proven. Reliable products at reasonable prices. It’s not just a tagline, it’s what has led our product development for decades. Every Proctor Silex appliance begins its journey in our engineering lab. Motors rotate, switches turn and mechanical arms spin for days on end, testing each function and feature. Then it’s off to the test kitchen, where the staff uses the product much like you would. Only when an appliance passes our rigorous testing do we know it’s ready for its final test – your home. Proctor Silex Simply-Crisp 4-Slice Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo The Proctor Silex Simply-Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven combines Simply-Crisp air frying functionality with the versatility of a classic toaster oven. You get the even crisping and browning of air frying right on your countertop, plus you can bake, broil and toast. Using little to no oil, the Simply-Crisp mode turns fresh or frozen French fries, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables and more into crispy deliciousness that you and your family will love. Just add food to the mesh rack without overcrowding it, slide it into the oven and place the bake pan underneath to catch drippings. The toaster oven 4 versatile cooking options for air frying, baking, broiling and toasting Space-saving design fits a personal pizza and other popular foods Fits 4 slices of bread, a personal pizza or 1/2 pound of fries, yet it doesn't take up too much space. The timer knobs operates up to 30 minutes and has an optional Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff

4 Versatile Cooking Options You get the convenience and deliciousness of crispy air frying along with all the classic toaster oven functions you love: bake, broil and toast. Space-Saving Design Fits a Personal Pizza This toaster oven has plenty of room and 2 rack positions that make it easy to cook all your favorite foods. It fits 4 slices of bread, a personal pizza or 1/2 pound of fries. The toaster oven has a compact footprint that doesn't take too much space on the countertop. Easy to Use The oven is easy to use with 2 independent control knobs. The timer knob operates up to 30 minutes and has a optional Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff. The temperature knob lets you select cooking temperatures from 200°F to 450°F. Includes Accessories The oven comes with all the accessories you need to air fry, bake, broil, and toast. It includes a chrome-plated mesh rack and a nesting bake pan, plus an integrated drop-down crumb tray. The chrome-plated rack has handles that slide into the oven slots. The bake pan slides under the mesh rack to catch drippings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer toaster oven is great! Just the right size. Works great and great value. Definitely recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heats Well, Air Fry is great, Toast is Perfect
reviews.reviewText: I have had this toaster oven for a week and used it every day. My only problem is reading the dials. The area where I located the oven does not have the brightest light available. Reading the dials is very difficult. All models of Air Fryers in this price range seem to have the controls on the side. Maybe if my eyes were young operating the oven would be easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toaster oven replacement on steroids
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace my ancient toaster oven that finally stopped working. I love that it is a multi-device I can toast, bake, broil, and air fry. Nice size can toast 6 slices at a time and also great for cooking smaller items like pizza and chicken. Comes with everything you need including mesh basket, bake pan, and broil rack. Very easy to use and clean when you are done. Dials are well labeled and easy to turn. You can cook so many things in this all in one it has been a game changer. The nice part in the summer is not having to turn on the oven and heat up the house if we are just cooking something smaller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylist and effective
reviews.reviewText: Have used it twice and it works really well. Need to go about 5 minutes more to cook than my dedicated air fryer. Controls are easy to use and understand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No simple rack comes with this "toaster" oven!
reviews.reviewText: It's my bad for not noticing that this only comes with an air frying basket and small pan, and NOT an actual simple rack shelf. But everyone (including the company itself) acknowledges that this thing is not really a legit air fryer yet an excellent little toaster oven like the ones of old with a hotter setting that they're calling an air fryer. So I feel that this is a major omission that a simple rack shelf is not included. The air frying basket has turned up edges, so you can't put a little pizza in there for example and have it lie flat unless it fits within the confines of the edges of the basket, which shaves off quite a bit of otherwise usable space in the oven to accommodate things that need to lie flat that you want to cook/toast/reheat from both above and below simultaneously. It's a essential missing part of a well designed toaster oven IMO, so a disappointment for us. That said, we'll use it this week to see how well it operates and whether we're happy with it. If it's great, no problem and I'll update my review. But at this point it's a 3/5. Seems like it "could" work "ok," but it's not our optimal set up for a toaster over for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It came as described just fine
reviews.reviewText: The one thing I do not like is that it does not open in the back for ease of cleaning the bottom of the unit, my last one did, otherwise it works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars New air fryer
reviews.reviewText: Quieter than my other one, but takes up more space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wow. This is a great value. We are using it a lot. It even fits a frozen pizza! Cooks in 10minutes without heating up the whole kitchen. Chicken from frozen is 20 minutes. French fries are great. Toaster function is very even. Love it.
